title: Dear RIOT, can we get another champ from the Voodoo Lands?
body: That is all I am asking. As I noticed that {{champion:1}} is the only one to come from there. As surely there must be a ton of mage characters there and they are all practicing some dark magics.

replies.body: But Annie is from Noxus.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-23T18:34:25.958+0000)
>
> But Annie is from Noxus.

Her parents are from Noxus. She herself was born in the Voodoo Lands and that is actually her current residence as well.


> [{quoted}](name=LaoBushido,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-23T18:36:20.080+0000)
>
> yea i think the voodoo lands were retcon but we dont know because riot want to keep the new map under super lock and key

Nope. The Voodoo Lands weren't retconned at all, the only thing retconned was the IoW.

> [{quoted}](name=ThePowerOfNoob,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T17:49:18.932+0000)
>
> The answer to your question is yorick incoming rework :3

Really? Can you provide a source?
Riot has made numerous posts about it. Yorick is a largescale rework, after Poppy and 2016 Taric changing.

> [{quoted}](name=VulDread,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-23T20:17:04.905+0000)
>
> Riot has made numerous posts about it. Yorick is a largescale rework, after Poppy and 2016 Taric changing.

??? I know he's in for a rework, but I don't recall ever reading anything about it tying him to the Voodoo Lands.

Yeah they haven't said voodoo land bs, I thought you were just asking about Yorick having a rework in general.
But the first time they tried to rework him, they came up with a "Family heirloom shovel" Thank god they scratched that idea.

> [{quoted}](name=VulDread,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-23T20:17:04.905+0000)
>
> Riot has made numerous posts about it. Yorick is a largescale rework, after Poppy and 2016 Taric changing.

So Yorick is now associated with the Voodoo Lands as well? I don't disagree with the decision, but why? Yorick is firmly established as a champion when it comes to his backstory. He comes from, was raised in, and also works as the gravedigger and ferryman for the Shadow Isles.
He's not associated with the Voodoo Lands.
Good to know.
Why doesn't he have his new lore? Wil we have to wait for his relaunch?
Though I think  they mentioned already that Urgot is also already on the table,so I guess that he'll be finished before Yorick as well(unless they run into bigger problems).
I'm pretty sure the only other champ we have had from Voodoo lands was old {{champion:48}}

> [{quoted}](name=L Rayquaza,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-10-24T00:16:10.033+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure the only other champ we have had from Voodoo lands was old {{champion:48}}

{{champion:48}}  actually came from the Plague Jungles if we are going by Pre-rework. North East of the Plague Jungles is where the Voodoo Lands exist. Which are located right next to Shurima.

Runeterra Map: http://img.wikia.nocookie.net/intmap_tile_set_738/thumb/20140728092924!phpwBA8KT.jpg/680x382x5-20140728092924!phpwBA8KT.jpg

>Nothing confirmed, but if this kind of stuff piques your interest, I'd look up the cut champ, Tabu, who is...probably the reason the Voodoo Lands are even a thing. Annie really doesn't have a Voodoo aesthetic at all, but at one point there was a planned champion who looked like a Voodoo Witch Doctor. You can see his model and a few of his ability icons on the wiki.
>
>http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Tabu

Thank you for the information.

I think it's unlikely a place called the Voodoo Lands exists in the new landscape of Runeterra. Voodoo is a real world religion, and so not something we would implement as a main signifier for much at all, never mind a region.

Just my thoughts, not set in stone, but still I doubt we'll be talking about the Voodoo Lands as a place in Valoran. It could just mean a name change, or maybe more.
Have you guys ever considered fleshing out the Black Rose? (Leblanc and her crew)

We've discussed some possibilities with Leblanc. Some mind-blowing stuff from a newer member of Foundations and Narrative that I think is really intriguing. It's not ready yet though and we have some other priorities for now.

What about the "left behind" champions like Orianna and Jax and all them? Do you guys plan to approach them this year (by this I guess I mean next year) or are you going to be waiting until you can fold them into something else?

(just so we're clear I am totally on board with potential Targon lore, I am just wondering what is going on with these guys from your team's perspective)
I still think it makes sense that Leblanc faked the means of death of the elder Yasuo was supposed to protect.

Isn't it widely known Riven killed the elder? 
LeBlanc can't use wind technique.

It feels like you've borrowed from real life races/religions before in lore. Post-retcon too. Voodoo imo is something that's hardly explored in fiction, at least without coming across as stereotypical.
They borrowed, but did not make something exactly like one. They did not "Christian City", for example
Eh I half saw Demacia as the crusader city. Isn't TF a literal gypsy in his lore?

Nah he's of the River Folk now. While they draw influence from real world gypsies they're not real world gypsies. That's the main thing. It's the difference between Demacia drawing from christian and crusader influences and actually being called the christian nation.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2015-10-27T00:23:56.967+0000)
>
> I think it's unlikely a place called the Voodoo Lands exists in the new landscape of Runeterra. Voodoo is a real world religion, and so not something we would implement as a main signifier for much at all, never mind a region.
> 
> Just my thoughts, not set in stone, but still I doubt we'll be talking about the Voodoo Lands as a place in Valoran. It could just mean a name change, or maybe more.

So does this mean a rework of Annie's backstory?
What about the Fyrone Flats, Plague Jungle, Kumungu, Ironspike Mountains, Great Barrier, and Serpentine River?
Since you're talking about the Voodoo Lands,will this change potentially effect The Gray Order (the group of former Noxians Annie is from)?
yea i think the voodoo lands were retcon but we dont know because riot want to keep the new map under super lock and key
I hope it's another little girl https://anixp.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/pedobear_acchi_kocchi_584.gif

> [{quoted}](name=BlunterMonk,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-10-24T02:22:26.305+0000)
>
> I hope it's another little girl.

Take a listen to the soundclip in the link provided by Thewannabegamer. That doesn't sound like the voice of a child. Although I can see why their could be the desire of seeing another child character seeing as how {{champion:1}} is from the voodoo lands.
I always thought {{champion:9}} was from Voodoo Lands, but yeah we do need a new champ from there.

Fiddle was born in the Institute of War. 
It would be fitting if Fiddlesticks was the boogeyman-thing of the Voodoo Lands.
A voodoo themed champ would be really awesome!

Sound file that popped up on the PBE a couple days ago:

http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/pbe-2110-mysterious-champ-select-quote-slayer-jinx-slayer-pantheon-zombie-nunu-splash-art-new-summoner-icons-48361/

Voodoo

> [{quoted}](name=Thewannabegamer,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-10-24T01:33:56.909+0000)
>
> Sound file that popped up on the PBE a couple days ago:
> 
> http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/pbe-2110-mysterious-champ-select-quote-slayer-jinx-slayer-pantheon-zombie-nunu-splash-art-new-summoner-icons-48361/
> 
> Voodoo

I did a long search through google and I cannot find any pre-existing names that are Illaoi. So the name could be made up by RIOT or that its origin is just very obscure.

Her quote when translated comes out to be:
"I am not a fan of (giving) sermons, broken bones are better." 
Which is obviously one of her taunts. 

A sermon is done usually when regarding a religion of sorts.

Its possible she could be our Voodoo champion. Though I require more information before I could flat out say "yes" or "no".
Would be cool if they made a voodoo doll based champion

A voodoo doll champ would be really cool. Especially if it originally belonged to Tabu and was found in the Voodoo Lands. Voodoo dolls are typically known of causing pain and misfortune, so the best way to capture that in LoL would be abilities and damage that get reflected back. Voodoo Dolls are often displayed as fairly resilient to the punishment given to them, so the role of Tank makes the most sense.

I did some more research for possible hints. What I did come up with was that although the Puppeteer from the Harrowing 2014 looks like an updated version of Tabu, Riot has said its not Tabu and that its a totally original character. Which makes the second instance of a look-a-like being found within the Harrowing; the first being Averdrian and his head on the main page for the Harrowing. Both Averdrian and Tabu were found in caskets during a previous Harrowing and confirmed dead/cancelled. So one could take this as a red herring when it comes to Tabu and Averdrian.

Nothing confirmed, but if this kind of stuff piques your interest, I'd look up the cut champ, Tabu, who is...probably the reason the Voodoo Lands are even a thing.  Annie really doesn't have a Voodoo aesthetic at all, but at one point there was a planned champion who looked like a Voodoo Witch Doctor.  You can see his model and a few of his ability icons on the wiki.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Tabu
what is the voodoo lands and is the shaman coming back from em someday?

> [{quoted}](name=ihaveapotion,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-10-23T22:41:22.874+0000)
>
> what is the voodoo lands and is the shaman coming back from em someday?

Here is the lore behind it:

>An unforgiving barren wilderness, the Voodoo Lands were colonized by political and social outcasts from Noxus, known as the Gray Order, who sought to leave their neighbors in peace as they pursued dark arcane knowledge. The leaders of this outcast society are a married couple: Gregori Hastur, the Gray Warlock, and his wife Amoline, the Shadow Witch. Though survival was a challenge at times, the Gray Order's colony managed to thrive in a land where so many others would have failed.

The only character to come from this region is little {{champion:1}} herself and she has been in the game since LoL's release back in 2009.

As for the shaman himself? I do not know if they will do with him like they did with say making Priscilla into {{champion:60}} or Gavid into {{champion:143}}. I would personally hope so.

> [{quoted}](name=Trolosaurus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-10-23T22:34:30.172+0000)
>
> I have a feeling the Voodoo Lands were supposed to tie into Tabu, the cancelled Voodoo Shaman.
> But after he got scrapped they've just kind of sat there.

That is a very good educated guess at what happened with Tabu and The Voodoo Lands.
...Now I want to see Annie's Parents as champions.

I have a feeling the Voodoo Lands were supposed to tie into Tabu, the cancelled Voodoo Shaman.
But after he got scrapped they've just kind of sat there.
I really wish we could see Annie grow up.  We'd lose the only kid champ, but you have to wonder what kind of a bad-ass (or terror?) she'll become.

> [{quoted}](name=aliceandsven,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-23T19:17:06.729+0000)
>
> I really wish we could see Annie grow up.  We'd lose the only kid champ, but you have to wonder what kind of a bad-ass (or terror?) she'll become.

Ekkos a kid

Isn't he an Ezreal the same age?  Isn't Ezreal a kid?  Isn't Lux?

Isn't {{champion:150}}?

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5LGzycwc,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-10-23T22:50:16.293+0000)
>
> Isn't he an Ezreal the same age?  Isn't Ezreal a kid?  Isn't Lux?
> 
> Isn't {{champion:150}}?

Idk I feel like ezreal would be 16-20 but ekko looks and acts like he's just turning into a teenager I'm not sure about lux
For Ezreal's work position and popularity around Piltover, he's very likely to be older than 20.
{{champion:154}} is also technically pretty young. {{champion:78}}
Im probertly wrong but i just feel luke voodoo fits tahm kench well

A character from the voodoo lands would help bring more attention to it. For a large chunk of Runeterra, its not really talked about like it was forgotten in the lore.  I am surprised we haven't gotten another champion besides  {{champion:1}} from there.
